fields.title: Bayesian linear regression
fields.pointers: *  [Gaussian process regression](gaussian_process_regression)  is a nonparametric analogue of Bayesian linear regression which uses kernels.
fields.summary: By interpreting linear regression as a Bayesian model, we can automatically infer the prior variance and the noise variance, and make calibrated predictions. Bayesian linear regression is a useful component in fancier probabilistic models.
